item.title: Thumbcache Windows Forensic Artifact
item.description: Theory These files represent the preview that we see in the file explorer when we want to open a file. For example, we can see preview of images or PDFs as it can be seen there ![[Pasted image 20230606183149.png]] Here are other examples ![[Pasted image 20230606183513.png]] Thumbs.db Created for Windows Vista, not used anymore but can still be present Thumbcache_<resolution>.db These are the actual artifact files that can be found and investigated on modern systems.
